title: Towing of Illegally Parked Vehicles
summary: Allows for towing of vehicles parked illegally at the owner’s expense.

title: Owner’s Responsibility for Parking Violations
summary: Holds the registered owner of a vehicle responsible for parking violations, regardless of who was driving.

title: Parking Exemptions for Emergency and City Vehicles
summary: Exempts emergency vehicles and city vehicles from parking regulations when necessary.

title: Temporary Parking Permits
summary: Allows certain individuals or groups to obtain temporary parking permits that exempt them from specific parking regulations.

title: Effective Date of By-Law
summary: Specifies when this by-law comes into effect and under what conditions enforcement begins.
